pages.title: Gastornis
pages.text: Gastornis are large flightless birds, while they resemble the predatory Terror Birds, they are herbivores that feed on tough plant material and seeds.$(br2)Gastornis is generally agreed to be related to waterfowl.

pages.title: Gastornis
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rabbit$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: None Days
